name: Pandemic Relief
description:
Drawing inspiration from the current 2020 Covid-19 pandemic, play as an emergency services worker distributing PPE (personal protection equipment) to increasing numbers of people. Careful though, you don't want to hit of the citizens!

This was my final project for me Tiny Games class. It is the culmination of my skills so far in Pico-8, although I hope to keep working in the platform in future game jams. It features high score mechanics, hit detection, a title screen, and a (single) soundtrack!

This game was created as part of the Tiny Games class at the ATLAS Institute at The University of Colorado Boulder
